title: seyalE shiva guNam
sahitya:
seyalE shiva guNam dinam cintittu nalam purivAi manamE


anupallavi

  peyalE vAn mazhaiyAm verum pErukkum pugazhukkum pEship-payan enna


caraNam    vAip-pandal uyarndAlum mazhaikkup-pAdukAppO manaivi kaTTu munbE maghaLukku vaLaik-kAppO
kAikku munnE kani kaDaikkaNakkAghumO kAriyam Aghu munbE vIriyam pEshalAmO
